summary: The customer had a question about their billing for a 50 inch LED smart TV they recently purchased from Contoso Wireless. The agent explained that the cost of the TV was $599.99 plus taxes and shipping fees and that they would be billed monthly for this amount. The agent also explained that there were warranties available for the TV, with a standard one-year warranty covering any defects or damages, and an extended warranty covering any additional damages or defects after the first year. The customer was satisfied with the answer and did not have any further questions.
